# GKGameActivityDefinition

**Class**

An object that represents the static metadata you define for the activity.

## Declaration

```swift
class GKGameActivityDefinition
```

## Getting the display properties and image

- **title**: A short title for the game activity.
- **details**: A more detailed description of the game activity.
- **defaultProperties**: Default properties defined by the developer for this type of game activity.
- **loadImage(completionHandler:)**: Asynchronously load the image. Error will be nil on success.

## Getting the activity capabilities

- **supportsPartyCode**: Whether the activity can be joined by others via a party code.
- **supportsUnlimitedPlayers**: True if the activity supports an unlimited number of players. False if maxPlayers is set to a defined limit or if no player range is provided.
- **playerRange**: The range of players supported by this type of game activity.
- **playStyle**: The play style of the game activity.
- **GKGameActivityPlayStyle**: Play Style of the game activity. It can be either Asynchronous or Synchronous.

## Getting the fallback URL

- **fallbackURL**: A fallback URL that can be used to construct a game-specific URL for players to share or join, if the joining device does not support the default URL.

## Getting the release state

- **releaseState**: The release state of the game activity definition in App Store Connect.
- **GKReleaseState**: Describes the release state of an App Store Connect resource, such as an Achievement or Leaderboard.

## Getting the identifier properties

- **identifier**: The developer defined identifier for a given game activity.
- **groupIdentifier**: The group identifier for the activity, if one exists.

## Loading activity definitions

- **loadGameActivityDefinitions(completionHandler:)**: Loads all the game activity definitions for the current game.

## Loading achievement descriptions

- **loadAchievementDescriptions(completionHandler:)**: Loads all associated achievements that have defined deep links to this game activity definition.

## Loading leaderboards

- **loadLeaderboards(completionHandler:)**: Loads all associated leaderboards that have defined deep links to this game activity definition.

## Type Methods

- **loadGameActivityDefinitions(IDs:completionHandler:)**: Loads game activity definitions with the supplied App Store Connect identifiers.

## Activities

- **Creating activities for your game**: Use activities to surface game content to players and encourage them to connect with each other.
- **GKGameActivity**: An object that represents a single instance of a game activity for the current game.
- **GKGameActivityListener**: An object that responds to activity events.

- NSObject
